meanings.definition: The study or literature of the lives of saints.
meanings.sent1: In her hagiologies class, she learned about the stories of different saints.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often refer to ancient hagiologies to understand the lives of saints.
meanings.sent3: The hagiologies book made the saints' lives seem like exciting adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for hagiologies turned the saints' stories into fascinating tales.
meanings.sent5: The hagiologies course painted vivid pictures of the saints' experiences.

meanings.definition: The branch of theology that deals with the lives and legends of saints.
meanings.sent1: Studying hagiologies helps us understand the beliefs surrounding saints.
meanings.sent2: The priest's sermon delved into the significance of hagiologies in Christianity.
meanings.sent3: The hagiologies discussion in class sparked an interesting debate.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to hagiologies made him see the world through saintly eyes.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of hagiologies lies in the stories of miraculous saints.
